item.description:
This Ride is for those in the 10-12 mph Range.  Beginners & Newer Riders, are more than Welcome.  This is a Flat Ride, with Nice Water Views.  The Speed Limits on the Roads, are 25 mph or Less !!!  You can get up to 20 Miles, but the way I designed it, you can go less, if you need too. You are never more than 2 or 3 miles, from your Car.    We even take our Break at a Beach.

 

After the Ride, join me for some Ice Cream or Frozen Yogurt.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the Parking Lot, just before you enter the Park, on the Left
item.name: Casual Paced Bike Ride, in Warwick
